David Beckham's new malaria awareness ad sees him aged up several decades. 
The footie ace, 45, looks around 70 in the ad after some digital tampering.
He filmed the short ad for the Malaria Must D… [+2337 chars]

articles.author: Rachel Russell
articles.title: Kate to receive early Christmas present with a drawing of beloved dog Lupo from artist - Daily Express
articles.description: KATE, the Duchess of Cambridge, and Prince William are set to receive a drawing of their dog Lupo who sadly died last week.
